home.welcomeDescription:
The tool allows to perform on the sequences to detect desired and undesired characteristics during the 
 iterative design process. It is explained in general what is the objective of applying each 
 none of the methods and the fundamentals in which The details of how the different resources are integrated in the context of our application are presented, representing their results in the scoring scheme of our method. 
 
The set of evaluations described corresponds to this first version of our Therefore, it does not represent an exhaustive or final set, but rather a first stage that should be analyzed and modified in a logical way according to the results obtained.
home.moreMessage: To know in more details about the process, click the button below

about.title: About us
about.description:
The Patena Community is a group formed by two institutions: The University of Buenos Aires, the University of La Plata. 
 
Who work here we do it guided by the principles and values that our founder transmitted to us, and mobilized for the only transcendent purpose that marks the direction of our Institutions.
